name: SKYE - Public Beta
description:
SKYE

SKYE is a flight game that focuses on exploration in a world inspired by the Scottish Hebrides. Fly around the islands, completing quests for villages and racing trough the world in your seaplane. Fly around in a painterly environment. 

Key features
  • Fly and maneuver around a beautiful archipelago.
  • Exciting arcady flight controls.
  • Non photo-realistic rendering.
  • Flight based quests and collectibles.
  • exploration at your own pace.
In development! beta release

SKYE is a project from 3rd year game development students at Breda University of Applied Sciences. We will be working on this game for the coming 10 weeks and need your feedback to improve it! The full games' release will be on Steam, as a free-to-play title. We'll be announcing more about our upcoming release date soon!

We would love to hear your feedback or even see how you played the game through video.

Thank you in advance and lets make an amazing game together!

Controls

Our game can be played with keyboard or Xbox controller (additional controller support is planned for the Steam release).

  • WASD / Left Thumbstick = Pitch & Yaw
  • Mouse /  Right Thumbstick = Roll
  • E / X button (Xbox controller) = Interact / Shoot
  • Space / A Button (Xbox controller) = Skip dialog / In-Menu Control
  •  M / Start button (Xbox controller) = open map
  • Right MB / B Button (Xbox Controller) = place marker on map
Music

Soundtrack provided by Alex Tosh.
Listen to more from Alex! - https://soundcloud.com/user-861715007
